Marabu.Hero: Discover the world with Marabu – For more moments by the sea
Marabu.Description: Sandy hair, don't care: Marabu flies from Hamburg and Munich to the most beautiful beaches around the Med, Egypt, the Canary Islands, Portugal and Spain. Sun guaranteed! Passengers can expect a modern fleet, the latest generation of aircraft as well as comfort and service.

Destinations.Title: Destinations
Destinations.Description: Diving the Red Sea, Yamas in Greece, Beach siesta in Spain or the Portuguese Algarve? Marabu operates non-stop from Hamburg and Munich to the most popular holiday destinations.

Fleet.Title: Fleet
Fleet.Description: Marabu operates modern and highly efficient aircraft: The Airbus A320 aircraft uses latest technology with reduced emissions, lower fuel consumption and less noise – and the highest level of customer comfort. Our fleet is maintained to the highest European standards. Passengers can look forward to a reliable and pleasant flight experience.

Career.Title: Crew up!
Career.Description: If you want to be part of a young and agile company with great colleagues, apply to join us. We are looking for: Flight captains (m/f/d), first officers (m/f/d) and flight attendants (m/f/d).

01.Title:
Comfy
mode on
01.Description: Relaxing seats in Economy, or even more comfort in Business? Choose the window seat.

02.Title:
Snacks
and drinks
02.Description: Hearty and sweet, regional and vegan: enjoy your time on board with snacks and drinks from the Marabu on-board bistro.

03.Title: Good entertainment
03.Description: Stream films, series, podcasts, music and games on your own mobile devices – or maybe you prefer the cinema of clouds?
